suggestions.original: To improve the picture organization, consider adjusting the sizes of the figures to be more consistent, which will help create a more balanced composition. Additionally, try to avoid overlapping heads by spacing the children more evenly. This will enhance the flow and make the individual characters more distinguishable. Emphasizing the central figure with the red bow and ensuring the rainbow remains a clear focal point will further strengthen the visual narrative.
